experience: You and Dan both know Anila Arthanari, Jared Vishney, and 44 others
Dan can introduce you to 8 people at American Express

Small Box Energy provides food safety and energy management solutions to help family dining, quick service restaurants and convenience stores improve their bottom line by reducing energy consumption and operating costs.  Small Box Energy truly understands the unique needs of our customers and delivers a solution combining energy management and food safety that’s immediately useful in the unique operational environment of the small box retailer. Validated by the largest restaurant brands in the world, Small Box Energy’s IoT hardware and cloud based software platform focuses on improving the efficiency of HVAC, lighting and refrigeration while improving food safety through temperature monitoring, early equipment diagnostics, preset alarms and alerts. We reduce costly incidents and labor intensive tasks, all paid for by savings generated through energy management. Simply stated, Small Box Energy’s chameleon system makes you cash flow positive from month one.

Entrepix, Inc. is a leading provider of Chemical Mechanical Polishing (CMP) and related wafer surface conditioning process outsourcing and equipment services. The company provides production, integration and optimization services to IDMs, OEMs, MEMS, nanotechnology and CMP consumables suppliers from its ISO 9001:2008 certified foundry in Tempe, AZ.Entrepix also supplies CMP and metrology equipment to support customers' internal processing requirements. The company's comprehensive processing and equipment capabilities provide customers wafer surface conditioning solutions, from initial integration and optimization, through pilot production and high volume manufacturing.

Music.com is the premier site to discover both the latest and the greatest in music and videos. With millions of fans, millions of music video plays and thousands of new artists, it is the destination to discover new music to love. The underlying technology provides a single, simple, effective platform for emerging artists to manage, distribute, and most importantly, monetize their music.  It gives rising stars the same tools and capabilities that until now where only available to artists with major recording contracts and talent management.  It also connects these artists directly with unique distribution channels to key audience sectors and to build an audience of new fans. Music.com is the destination used by millions to watch their favorite videos while easily discovering great new music curated to each fan’s unique taste.
New Music Artist Kristine Elezaj - Discovered on music.com - Awarded Recording Contract
New Music Artist Kristine Elezaj - Discovered on music.com - Awarded Recording Contract

Inilex (acquired by Spireon) is a leading provider of intelligent telemetry solutions and Apprize is the next evolution of M2M applications for Inilex. The company’s Advantra product is an industry-leading M2M development platform and its vehicle safety and security products combine the latest in GPS and cellular messaging systems. Inilex’s solutions monitor, track and control machines across a number of industries, including automotive, trucking and transportation, equipment rentals, energy management, telemedicine, financial, government and marine.

Genius Central (Living Naturally) is the leading online marketing and procurement company in the natural products, specialty grocery and independent pharmacy sectors. The company processes over $1.5 billion in online commerce transactions annually and has more than 1.7 million subscribed consumers to its online network. Genius Central's core focus areas are its centralized buying environment and its emerging suite of mobile marketing applications for industry retailers and suppliers. Key products include ScanGenius, WebGenius, PromoGenius, LoyaltyGenius, and more.
Member of the Board of Directors

NewsComm brings local news and magazines with targeted, effective advertising and offers to millions of captive TV audiences across the county. Utilizing a customizable SmartTV interactive application, NewsComm allows local newspapers and magazines to showcase their existing content right to the living rooms of cable and satellite TV subscribers all with the simple click of a remote. Users can access their choice of breaking news, local special interest stories, weather alerts, etc. without having to leave the couch.  In addition, the application allows for highly targeted, interactive advertising and special offers within the newspaper and magazine stories which can be further accessed and redeemed via smartphones or tablets.  All of this means customers are getting the local news and information they want with highly relevant ads for which they control the level of interaction which, in the end, creates more revenue for all the parties involved.  Extra!  Extra!  See all about it!

Scentsa is an innovation of Crescent House Publishing Inc., an award-winning multimedia technology company serving the global retail industry.  We create marketing and information software solutions for retailers and vendors to reinforce brand awareness, create in-store marketing excitement, and enhance sales training.The Scentsa Experience includes interactive touch screens, digital advertising, and mobile applications. Our software and interactive marketing solutions are ideal for specialty retailers.

Joeri Kreisberg (joeri@arnon.co.il)
Attorney, Partner at Yigal Arnon & Co.
March 2, 2010, Dan was a client of Joeri’s

Joeri is an outstanding attorney, well skilled and balanced, but his greatest value is the business acumen he brings to a negotiation or transaction.  His knowledge and connections in the high tech community in Israel are extremely valuable, and he is exceptionally strong in understanding US culture and bridging the gaps. He is an unusual lawyer, and brings value by becoming an extension of our team. I rely on him and highly recommend Joeri.

Ron Wilkins
Serving on numerous boards and as Chairman/CEO at Wilkins Solutions Corp.
August 13, 2009, Dan was a client of Ron’s

In the short while that I've known Ron, I've been incredibly impressed by his wildly diverse knowledge, exceptional pedigree and down-to-earth attitude.  He's a straight shooter that can distill complex conversations down to the stuff that really matters, while still being extremely personable and a trusted friend.  In addition to the wonderful experience I've had with Ron while working on the partnership between Devix and WinBuyer, I've been overwhelmed by his clients' impressions of both him and his ecommerce platform.  I look forward to working with Ron for many years to come, not only on our existing partnership, but also on our other mutual interests...as there are many.
